spec_data.Name: xml-common
spec_data.Description:
The xml-common is a subpackage of sgml-common which contains
a collection XML catalogs that are useful for processing XML,
but that don't need to be included in main package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:59:51 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common XML catalog and DTD files
